pages.text: $(bred)BucketHead Zombie$() is a Normal Zombie wearing Bucket Head.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)20$()$(br)$(bred)Defence Health$() : $(l)110$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : BucketHead Zombie with $(bgreen)green beard$() has $(l)Normal$() Damage. When it's in water, it will wear a $(byellow)ducky tube$() to speed up.
